channel.title: Website Approval
channel.description:
Http://Battle-X.net (RS2)
I'm not the owner of the website/server. Although, I am one of the developers for it and I would like to post it in the development section/ and or my signature.
I'm also requesting approval for my PkScape Server(Runescape Classic) Since I was told I would have to re-apply for approval from Si Force. The website is not currently up right now but it is, Http://PkScapeF2P.sytes.net. This one isn't a guarantee since I gave the PkScapeF2P to a friend so he will be hosting it/owning it for now on. So once he does that, I want him to still be able to use my Advertisement topic.

item.title: Website Approval
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

The Djinn:

Seems to me not many mods look at this board :p, I guess I am accepted?

Yes. Both websites are approved.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Approval
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

Seems to me not many mods look at this board :p, I guess I am accepted?

item.title: Website Approval
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I’m fine with the RS2 site, you’ll have to wait for other mods to approve it too.

The RSC one doesn’t have to be approved if it’s being used in the advertisements board.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Approval
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I think it was said somewhere that RSC was actually exempt from this, although I’m not 100% sure so we’ll have to wait for somebody who knows this for certain comments. Sorry for any inconvenience I caused if you are exempt from this though.

Read full topic
